SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientActions
public class ClientController extends Object implements ClientActions
The Client Controller modifies the model that is present in the client and the Model using the virtual server in response to an action performed in the view.

  • Method Details

    • configureClient

      public void configureClient(View view, String ip, Integer port) throws UnReachableServerException
      Configures the client binding it to the ip and port provided.
      Parameters:
      view - the representation of the view
      ip - the ip address
      port - the port number
      Throws:
      UnReachableServerException - if the server isn't reachable

    • connect

      public void connect(String username)
      Handles the connection of the client.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      username - the client's name.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int cardHandPosition, Side selectedSide, Position position) throws Playground.UnavailablePositionException, Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidGamePhaseException, SuspendedGameException
      Places the cardHandPosition on the selectedSide and position specified.
      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      cardHandPosition - the position of the card in the player's hand.
      selectedSide - of the card.
      position - in the playground at which it will be placed.
      Throws:
      Playground.UnavailablePositionException - if the position isn't empty or isn't contained in the player's playground.
      Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException - if the resources needed to place the card aren't enough.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow placing cards.
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.

    • draw

      public void draw(int IdToDraw) throws InvalidGamePhaseException, EmptyDeckException, NotExistingFaceUp, SuspendedGameException, InvalidIdForDrawingException
      Draws a card from the IdToDraw.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      IdToDraw - the id representing the deck or any of the face up cards positions.
      Throws:
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game doesn't allow to draw cards.
      EmptyDeckException - in the event that the selected deck is empty.
      NotExistingFaceUp - if the face up slot is empty.
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      InvalidIdForDrawingException - if the id of the card isn't valid.

    • placeStarter

      public void placeStarter(Side side) throws SuspendedGameException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the starter card of the player in the chosen side.
      Specified by:
      placeStarter in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      side - the side of the starter card.
      Throws:
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow placing cards.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(PlayerColor color) throws InvalidColorException, SuspendedGameException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Assigns color to the mainPlayerUsername.
      Specified by:
      chooseColor in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      color - chosen by the mainPlayerUsername.
      Throws:
      InvalidColorException - if the color has already been selected.
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow to choose the color.

    • placeObjectiveCard

      public void placeObjectiveCard(int chosenObjective) throws SuspendedGameException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the chosenObjective from one of the two available.
      Specified by:
      placeObjectiveCard in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      chosenObjective - the chosen objective.
      Throws:
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow to place the objective card.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message) throws InvalidMessageException
      Sends message from the mainPlayerUsername.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      message - sent by the mainPlayerUsername.
      Throws:
      InvalidMessageException - if the author doesn't match the author or the recipient doesn't exist

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(int playersNumber) throws InvalidPlayersNumberException
      Sets the number of players allowed in the lobby.
      Specified by:
      setPlayersNumber in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players of the game.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayersNumberException - if the size is greater than 4 or less than 2

      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface ClientActions
      Parameters:

      isConnected - player status.
      username - of the player.

    • updateAfterPlace

      public void updateAfterPlace(Map<Position,CornerPosition> positionToCornerCovered, List<Position> newAvailablePositions, Map<Symbol,Integer> newResources, int points, String username, ClientCard placedCard, Side placedSide, Position position)
      Updates the playground and the player's hand after a placement.
      Parameters:
      positionToCornerCovered - a map with the covered corners.
      newAvailablePositions - a list with the available positions.
      newResources - a map with the new acquired resources.
      points - present after the placement.
      username - of the player.
      placedCard - the card that has been placed.
      placedSide - the side of the card that has been placed.
      position - of the card in the playground.

    • updateAfterDraw

      public void updateAfterDraw(ClientCard drawnCard, ClientFace newTopBackDeck, ClientCard newFaceUpCard, String username, int boardPosition)
      Updates the player's hand and the golden/resource deck or face up card after a draw.
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - the card that has been drawn.
      newTopBackDeck - the new card that replaces the previous card that was present in the deck.
      newFaceUpCard - the new face up card that replaces the previous one.
      username - of the player who performs the drawing
      boardPosition - from which the card was selected, 4 for golden deck, 5 for resource deck and 0,1,2 or 3 for face up cards.
